mapper.select: select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId,stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cId=#{cId}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId,stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStatu=1

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cExperimentTextId=#{cExperimentTextId}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, el.cExperimentName,ge.cStatus from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_experimental_test el ,gy_report_grade_exam ge where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and ge.cExperimentId=el.cId and ge.cGradeId=stu.cGradeId and stu.cGradeId=#{cGradeId}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu, gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cExperimentTextId=#{0} and stu.cGradeId=#{1}

select DISTINCT rt.cReportNum, stu.cName,stu.cStudentNumber,stu.cGradeId, sct.cSum, el.cExperimentName from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el,gy_report_grade gd where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and stu.cGradeId=#{1} and rt.cExperimentTextId=#{0} and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStatu=1

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu, gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cExperimentTextId in
#{domain}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cId in
#{domain}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStudentId=#{cStudentId}

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, sct.cComment,sct.cConclution,sct.cCreateTime,sct.cExperiment,sct.cInserument,sct.cLabresult,sct.cReagen,sct.cSum,sct.cTherory, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el order by rt.cId desc

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStatu=0 order by rt.cId desc

select rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cPath,rt.cPdfPath,rt.cProcess,rt.cQRcode,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, stu.cGradeId, stu.cName,stu.cPicturePath,stu.cStudentNumber, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStatu=0 and rt.cStudentId=#{cStudentId}

select DISTINCT rt.cCreateTime,rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,rt.cReportNum,rt.cScoreId,rt.cStatu,rt.cStudentId,rt.cTeacherId, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify,ge.cStatus from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu, gy_report_experimental_test el,gy_report_grade_exam ge where rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and rt.cStudentId=#{cStudentId}

select DISTINCT rt.cExperimentTextId,rt.cId,stu.cGradeId, el.cExperimentEnglishName,el.cExperimentName,el.cExperimentTime,el.cClassify from gy_report_report rt,gy_report_student stu,gy_report_scoresheet sct,gy_report_experimental_test el where rt.cScoreId=sct.cId and rt.cStudentId=stu.cUserId and rt.cExperimentTextId=el.cId and el.cStatu=1;
